title: H.E Taye ATSKE-SELASSIE - Africa CEO Forum 2025
snippet: On October 7, 2024, Taye Atske-Selassie Amde was sworn in as the President of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia.

title: Taye Atske Selassie - Wikipedia
snippet: Taye Atske Selassie Amde (Amharic: ታዬ አጽቀሥላሴ, born 13 January 1956) is an Ethiopian diplomat and politician who is the President of Ethiopia since 2024. Prior to his presidency he served in multiple diplomatic roles, including ambassador to Egypt and Permanent representative ...

title: Ethiopia's new president: Taye Atske Selassie replaces Sahle-Work Zewde
snippet: Taye Astike Selassie, foreign minister since February, has taken up the largely ceremonial role.

title: Taye Atske Selassie sworn in as president of Ethiopia
snippet: In a surprising move, Ethiopia's two houses of parliament elected Taye Atske Selassie as president on Monday, succeeding the country's first woman head of state, Sahle-Work Zewde, who hinted at his resignation in a social media post just two ...

title: Ethiopia: New president signals willingness to dialogue
snippet: Ethiopia's new President, Taye Atske Selassie, has vowed to pursue peace in Ethiopia and beyond. The veteran diplomat replaced the first female president, Sahle-Work Zewde, who fell out with Prime Minister Abiy.
